statements: SELECT * FROM soil_samples WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT sample_date, soil_ph, soil_moisture FROM soil_samples WHERE soil_ph > 6;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples WHERE sample_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT sample_id, nutrient_levels->>'nitrogen' AS nitrogen_levels FROM soil_samples WHERE nutrient_levels->>'nitrogen' > 'medium';
SELECT count(*) AS total_samples FROM soil_samples;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples WHERE sample_id = 10 ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT drone_id, AVG(soil_ph) AS avg_ph FROM soil_samples GROUP BY drone_id HAVING AVG(soil_ph) > 6;
SELECT sample_id, drone_id, sample_date, nutrient_levels->>'nitrogen' AS nitrogen_level FROM soil_samples WHERE soil_moisture > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples WHERE sample_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND nutrient_levels->>'phosphorus' > 'low';
SELECT sample_id, drone_id, sample_date, (soil_ph * soil_moisture) AS ph_moisture_product FROM soil_samples ORDER BY ph_moisture_product DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT location, soil_type, pH FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT sample_id, moisture_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE pH > 7;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sample_id, soil_type, pH, moisture_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE moisture_level < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE pH > 6.5 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT location, soil_type, pH FROM SoilSamples WHERE moisture_level < 0.5 ORDER BY pH DESC
SELECT sample_id, location FROM SoilSamples INNER JOIN AnalysisResults ON SoilSamples.sample_id = AnalysisResults.sample_id WHERE AnalysisResults.irrigation_recommendation LIKE '%appropriate%'
SELECT * FROM AnalysisResults WHERE date_analyzed > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_analyzed DESC
SELECT location, AVG(pH) AS avg_ph FROM SoilSamples GROUP BY location HAVING avg_ph > 6
SELECT * FROM soil_samples;
SELECT sample_id, latitude, longitude FROM soil_samples WHERE soil_type = 'Clay';
SELECT * FROM fertilization_records ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT sample_id, fertilizer_type, application_amount FROM fertilization_records WHERE application_amount > 100;
SELECT sample_id, irrigation_type, irrigation_date, irrigation_amount FROM irrigation_records WHERE irrigation_amount < 50;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples;
SELECT sample_id, latitude, longitude, soil_type FROM soil_samples WHERE moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT sample_id, soil_type, moisture_level FROM soil_samples ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT s.sample_id, s.latitude, s.longitude, f.fertilizer_type, f.application_date FROM soil_samples s JOIN fertilization_records f ON s.sample_id = f.sample_id;
SELECT s.sample_id, s.latitude, s.longitude, i.irrigation_type, i.irrigation_amount FROM soil_samples s JOIN irrigation_records i ON s.sample_id = i.sample_id WHERE i.irrigation_amount > 5;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT sample_id, location, soil_type FROM SoilSamples WHERE moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT sample_date, location FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Fertilization WHERE amount > 10 ORDER BY fertilization_date ASC;
SELECT drone_name, purchase_date, operator_name FROM Drone;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY sample_id DESC, sample_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, soil_type FROM SoilSamples WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT sample_id, type, amount FROM Fertilization JOIN SoilSamples ON Fertilization.sample_id = SoilSamples.sample_id WHERE type = 'NPK' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT s.sample_id, i.irrigation_date, i.duration_hours, i.method FROM Irrigation i JOIN SoilSamples s ON i.sample_id = s.sample_id WHERE s.soil_type = 'Clay' ORDER BY i.irrigation_date ASC;
SELECT d.drone_name, s.location, s.moisture_level FROM Drone d JOIN SoilSamples s ON d.drone_id = s.drone_id WHERE s.moisture_level < 0.3 ORDER BY d.max_flight_time_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM Soil_Samples;
SELECT sample_id, soil_type, moisture_level FROM Soil_Samples WHERE moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT sample_id, sampling_date, soil_type FROM Soil_Samples ORDER BY sampling_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Fertilization_Records WHERE quantity_used >= 10;
SELECT record_id, fertilizer_type, application_date FROM Fertilization_Records ORDER BY application_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Soil_Samples WHERE moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT sample_id, sampling_date, soil_type FROM Soil_Samples ORDER BY sampling_date DESC;

SELECT Fertilization_Records.record_id, Fertilization_Records.fertilizer_type, Soil_Samples.moisture_level FROM Fertilization_Records JOIN Soil_Samples ON Fertilization_Records.sample_id = Soil_Samples.sample_id WHERE Fertilization_Records.quantity_used > 10;

SELECT Drone_Locations.drone_id, Drone_Locations.latitude, Drone_Locations.longitude, Field_Details.field_name FROM Drone_Locations JOIN Field_Details ON Drone_Locations.drone_id = Field_Details.field_id;

SELECT Field_Details.field_name, Field_Details.size_acres, Irrigation_Records.irrigation_type FROM Field_Details JOIN Irrigation_Records ON Field_Details.field_id = Irrigation_Records.sample_id WHERE Irrigation_Records.duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY Field_Details.size_acres DESC;
